title: magical grill lux nicer rito l3l

replies.body: It's a skin marketed for the weebs. Profits have risen for Riot by 420691337%.

> [{quoted}](name=Rav,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sFRcJL63,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-30T05:01:14.281+0000)
>
> It's a skin marketed for the weebs. Profits have risen for Riot by 420691337%.

I have a weaboo friend and my first thought when I saw Star Guardian Lux was "this is gonna fuel his fetishes"...

Like really, I understand that LoL is trying to market 'everyone' but like, to the others who find weaboo sht childish, it gets annoying to know that Riot is that desperate for market audience...
zzzzâ€¦ still waiting for the next Zac skin :,( {{champion:154}} {{champion:154}}
